item.title: Install Bspwm
item.description: What is BSPWM? BSPWM is a tiling window manager that arranges windows in a non-overlapping pattern. It is very easy to configure. bspwm doesn’t handle any keyboard or pointer inputs a third party program (e.g. sxhkd) is needed in order to translate keyboard and pointer events to bspc invocations. Follow these step-by-step instructions to install BSPWM on your Linux system: Install Bspwm Start by installing BSPWM using your package manager.
